info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 23 at 7:04PM MDT until April 23 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Northern Eddy County in southeastern New Mexico... West central Lea County in southeastern New Mexico...
* Until 800 PM MDT.
* At 703 PM MDT, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near Maljamar to near Brantley Lake State Park to 15 miles north of Carlsbad Caverns National Park, moving west at 40 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph.
SOURCE...Satellite imagery.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* Highway 285 between Carlsbad and Artesia and Highway 82 will be impacted.
Locations impacted include... Monument, Lea County Zip Franklin Memorial Airport, Loco Hills, Artesia, Artesia Municipal Airport, Avalon, Maljamar, Seven Rivers Airport, Dayton, Lakewood, Brantley Lake State Park, Halfway, Atoka, Lake Avalon, Lovington, Hope, Carlsbad North, Living Desert State Park, and Carlsbad.
info.instruction: Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 8:00 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 8:00 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 8:00 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 8:00 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
